desc: SensibleRest bedding is made from the Eucalyptus plant, making it softer, more breathable, and cleaner than cotton. It's Anti-bacterial, hypo-allergenic, natural and sustainable. Experience the Healing Power of NaturZinc® and Dermofresh, the natural way to cleaner, healthier sleep. Bedding for Clearer, Softer Skin.

layout.text: SensibleRest Bedding for Clearer, Softer, Healthier Skin
